prompt: FedEx: Your parcel ID #1234 contains illegal drugs. Press 1 to talk to Mumbai Narcotics Bureau.
response: Drugs in my parcel? That's impossible! I didn't order anything from abroad. Who sent this package? Can you tell me the sender's name and tracking number? This must be some mistake!

prompt: This is CBI. You are under digital arrest. Stay on video call until investigation is over. Do not disconnect.
response: CBI? Digital arrest? I don't understand what that means. What did I do wrong? I'm a law-abiding citizen! Can you please explain what's happening? Should I call my lawyer?

prompt: Your mobile number is linked to harassment cases. Mumbai Police Cyber Cell. Report immediately.
response: Harassment cases? My number? That's impossible! I haven't harassed anyone. How did this happen? Can you tell me who filed the complaint? This must be a mistake!

prompt: TRAI: Your mobile number will be blocked in 2 hours due to illegal activity.
response: Blocked in 2 hours? What illegal activity? I only use my phone for calls and WhatsApp. Can you tell me what I did wrong? How can I fix this?

prompt: Your Paytm KYC has been suspended. Call immediately or your wallet will be blocked in 24 hrs.
response: KYC suspended? But I just used my Paytm yesterday to pay for groceries. What exactly is the problem? Which documents do I need to update? Is there a deadline?

prompt: Your electricity power will be disconnected tonight at 9.30 PM. Contact officer immediately.
response: Power will be cut tonight? But I paid last month's bill! Can you check again? What's the pending amount? How can I pay immediately?

prompt: Part-time job at Amazon. Work from home. Earn Rs. 5000 daily. Just 2 hours work. Reply YES.
response: Rs 5000 daily? That sounds amazing! What kind of work is it? Do I need any experience? Is it legitimate? How do I know this is really from Amazon?

prompt: Earn Rs. 30,000/month by simple typing. Registration fee Rs. 999 (Refundable). Join now.
response: Rs 30,000 per month? That's good income! What kind of typing work is it? Why do I need to pay to get a job? Is the fee really refundable? When will I get paid?

prompt: Congratulations! You have won Rs. 25 Lakhs in KBC Lucky Draw. Contact Manager to claim.
response: I won 25 lakhs? Really? But I don't remember entering any lottery. How is this possible? Are you sure you have the right person? What do I need to do to claim it?

prompt: Income Tax Dept: You have a refund of Rs. 15,400 pending. Click to verify your bank account.
response: Tax refund of Rs 15,400? I did file my returns. How long does it take to get the money? Do I need to verify my bank account? Is this the official IT department website?

prompt: Hey, I am at the hospital. My GPay is not working. Can you urgently send 5k? Will return in 1 hour.
response: Oh no! Are you okay? What happened? Which hospital are you in? Is it serious? Let me know the details. Can't you use your debit card? What's the emergency?

prompt: Hello, this is Customs Dept. A parcel from UK addressed to you is held. Pay Rs. 18,000 duty.
response: Customs duty? I wasn't expecting any parcel from UK. Who sent it? What's inside? Can you tell me the sender's name? Why is the duty so high?

prompt: Upgrade to 5G SIM without changing number. Share the OTP sent to your mobile to activate.
response: 5G upgrade? That's great! But why do you need my OTP? I thought we should never share OTP with anyone. Are you sure this is safe? Can't you activate it from your end?

prompt: I am an Army officer posted in J&K. Want to sell my bike urgently. Pay Rs. 2000 delivery charge.
response: Army officer? That's respectable! Why are you selling the bike urgently? What's the bike model and condition? Can I see photos first? Where will it be delivered from?

prompt: Your loan of Rs. 2 Lakhs is approved. Download this app to disburse amount immediately.
response: Loan of 2 lakhs approved? I didn't apply for any loan. How did this happen? What's the interest rate? Is this from a registered bank? What app do I need to download?

prompt: I sent Rs. 500 to your number by mistake. Please scan this QR code to return it urgently.
response: You sent Rs 500 by mistake? Let me check my account. I don't see any money received. Can you show me the transaction screenshot? How do I return it?

prompt: Dear SBI Customer, your reward points worth Rs. 9800 will expire today. Click to redeem.
response: Reward points expiring? I didn't know that! How many points do I have? Which card is this for? How do I redeem them? Is this the official SBI website?

prompt: E-Challan: You have a pending traffic fine of Rs. 1000. Pay immediately to avoid court summons.
response: Traffic fine? Where and when did this happen? I don't remember any violation. Can you tell me the vehicle number and violation details? How can I check if this is real?

prompt: Your Netflix membership is on hold. Update your payment details to continue watching.
response: Netflix on hold? But I'm watching it right now. Let me check my account. What's the issue? My card has sufficient balance. Is this really from Netflix?

prompt: Invest Rs. 1000 in Bitcoin and get Rs. 5000 in 24 hours. Guaranteed returns.
response: Rs 5000 in 24 hours? That's 400% return! How is this possible? What's the risk? I thought crypto is risky. How can you guarantee returns? Is this legal?

prompt: Earn money by simply liking YouTube videos. Rs. 50 per like. Easy work from home.
response: Rs 50 per like? That's easy money! How many videos per day? Is it legal? How will you track my likes? When do I get paid? What's the payment method?

prompt: Hi, I'm your friend. My account got hacked. Can you send me Rs. 2000? Will pay tomorrow.
response: Your account hacked? That's terrible! But how do I know it's really you? Can you tell me something only my friend would know? Which friend are you? Can you video call?

prompt: Rent your terrace for Jio 5G Tower. Monthly rent 40k. Registration fee Rs. 5500.
response: Rs 40k monthly rent? That's amazing! Is there any health risk from tower radiation? Why do I need to pay to rent out my own terrace? Is this directly from Jio?

prompt: You won a Google Pay scratch card of Rs. 899. Send Rs. 1 to verify bank account.
response: Won Rs 899? That's nice! But why do I need to send Rs 1 to claim? Can't you verify from your end? Is this really from Google Pay? How did I win?

prompt: Hello, I am Dr. Aravind from UK. Saw your profile on Shaadi.com. Want to send gifts.
response: Doctor from UK? That's impressive! Tell me about yourself. What's your specialization? Are you looking for marriage? Tell me about your family. Why do you want to send gifts already?

prompt: Your PAN will be invalid if not linked to Aadhaar today. Click link to update instantly.
response: PAN will be invalid? I thought I already linked it! Let me check on the IT portal. What happens if I miss the deadline? What's the official website to do this?

prompt: We are calling from mobile operator. To improve network, dial *401*9812345678# immediately.
response: Dial *401*? What does this code do exactly? Will it cost me anything? My network is fine though. Can you tell me which company you're from? Is this mandatory?

prompt: Please donate for this child's heart surgery. Urgent funds needed. Click to donate via UPI.
response: Child's heart surgery? That's heartbreaking! Which hospital? Can I visit? How much is required? Can you share hospital documents? I want to verify this is real before donating.

prompt: Your old insurance policy has matured. Rs. 2 Lakhs bonus pending. Pay GST Rs. 5000 to release.
response: Insurance matured? Which policy is this? I have multiple policies. Why do I need to pay GST? Can't you deduct it from the bonus? What's the policy number?

prompt: PM Modi Free Laptop Scheme 2026. Register now to get free laptop. Click here.
response: Free laptop scheme? That's helpful for students! Is this really from the government? What are the eligibility criteria? How do I verify this is real? What documents are needed?

prompt: Your ICICI Credit Card has been blocked due to suspicious transaction. Click to verify.
response: Card blocked? I didn't make any suspicious transaction! What transaction are you talking about? Let me call the bank directly to verify. What's the official ICICI number?

prompt: Mom, help me! Some men caught me. They want money. Please send fast!
response: What? Who is this? Where are you? I'm calling the police right now! Stay calm! Tell me where you are! Are you hurt? What do these men want? Let me talk to them!

prompt: Your package delivery failed due to incomplete address. Pay Rs. 5 re-delivery charge.
response: Delivery failed? I wasn't expecting any package. What's the sender's name? What's in the package? Can you give me the tracking number? Why do I need to pay for re-delivery?

prompt: Get Domino's Pizza franchise in your city. High ROI. Application fee Rs. 10,000 only.
response: Domino's franchise? That's a big opportunity! Is this directly from Domino's? What's the total investment required? What's the expected ROI? Can you share official documents?

prompt: Sure shot jackpot call for tomorrow. Nifty 25000 CE. Join premium group for Rs. 5000.
response: Sure shot? I thought stock market is risky. How can you guarantee? What's your track record? Can you show past performance? Is this SEBI registered?

prompt: Booking confirmed at Hotel Taj. Pay 50% advance to this UPI ID to hold your room.
response: Booking confirmed? But I didn't book anything! Are you sure you have the right person? What's the booking reference number? Let me check my email first.

prompt: Your flight has been cancelled. Click here to process your full refund immediately.
response: Flight cancelled? Which flight? I didn't book any flight recently. What's the PNR number? Let me check my email and booking app first. Is this from the airline?

prompt: Your FastTag wallet is frozen. Verify KYC to unfreeze immediately.
response: FastTag frozen? But I just used it yesterday on the highway! What's the KYC issue? How do I verify? Is this really from FASTag? What's the official process?

prompt: Direct Govt Job for 10th/12th pass. Salary 30k. No exam. Pay Rs. 2000 file charge.
response: Government job without exam? That sounds too good to be true! Which department? Why do I need to pay for a government job? Is this legitimate? Can you show official notification?

prompt: You have won an iPhone 15 Pro Max! Just pay shipping charges of Rs. 499 to claim.
response: Won an iPhone? Really? But I don't remember entering any contest. Why do I need to pay shipping? Can you tell me which company is giving this? How did I win?

prompt: You are selected for National Scholarship 2026. Get Rs. 50,000. Registration fee Rs. 500.
response: Scholarship? That's great! Which scholarship is this? What are the criteria? Why is there a registration fee for a scholarship? Is this from the government?

prompt: Selling BGMI ID with Glacier skin. Level 70. Price Rs. 1000 only. Pay first.
response: BGMI account? Glacier skin is rare! But how do I know you'll give me the account after I pay? Can we use a middleman? What's the guarantee? Can you show screenshots?

prompt: Get Driving License without test. 100% original. Pay Rs. 3000 advance.
response: License without test? Is that even legal? How will you do it? What if I get caught? I think I should just take the test properly. Is this safe?

prompt: Post Office Double Money Scheme. Invest 1 Lakh get 2 Lakhs in 1 year.
response: Double money in 1 year? That's 100% return! Is this really from Post Office? What's the scheme name? Can you show me official documents? This sounds too good to be true.

prompt: Work in Canada. Salary $4000. Visa ready. Pay processing fee Rs. 25,000.
response: Job in Canada? That's exciting! What kind of job? Which company? Is the visa really ready? How do I verify this is legitimate? What documents do you have?

prompt: Guaranteed Tata IPO allotment through institutional quota. Invest min 2 Lakhs.
response: Guaranteed IPO allotment? I thought IPO is lottery-based. How can you guarantee? Is this legal? What's your connection with Tata? Can you show proof?
